caption.p: The crystal structures with lowest formation energy: ( a) Al 82Sm 10 (e.g. the η-Al 41Sm 5 phase), ( b) Al 80Sm 10, and ( c) Al 78Sm 10 with formation energy of 0.051, 0.055, and 0.063 eV/atom respectively, w.r.t. fcc-Al and Al 3Sm. All 3 structures have the 1-6-6-6-1 motif marked in blue. Pink (blue/grey) represents Al (Sm) atoms.
